name: App-a-cus
description:
Basic abacus for educational purposes, made using Godot Engine.

Simple and Intuitive Interface:

- Designed to be mobile friendly and work well on desktop platforms.

- Supports tiny as well as large screens.

- Intuitive icons for enjoyable experience from the first time.

Built with Accessibility in Mind:

- Color-blindness friendly.

- Clean and polished look that is easy on the eyes.

Open-Source Development:

- Development will be open to everyone.

- Contributors can check out the project at the official GitHub repository once the first version is released.

Report any Bugs or Issues:

- Found a bug? Leave a comment to help us get it fixed.

- Once the GitHub repository becomes ready, you can open a new issue there.
